infodynamics.measures.continuous.kernel

Class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKernel

  • java.lang.Object
    • infodynamics.measures.continuous.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
      • infodynamics.measures.continuous.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo
        • infodynamics.measures.continuous.kernel.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKernel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculator, ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate, InfoMeasureCalculatorContinuous, EmpiricalNullDistributionComputer

    public class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKernel
extends ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo
    An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator for multivariate time-series data (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate) which is affected using a box-kernel Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel) to make the calculations.

    That is, this class implements an AIS calculator using box-kernel estimation. This is achieved by plugging in MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel as the calculator into the parent class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo.

    Usage is as per the paradigm outlined for ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate, with:

    • The constructor step being a simple call to ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKernel();
    • Additional initialisation options #initialise(int, double) and initialise(int, int, double); and
    • setProperty(String, String) allowing properties for MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel.setProperty(String, String) (except MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate.PROP_TIME_DIFF as outlined in ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo.setProperty(String, String))

    References:

    • J.T. Lizier, M. Prokopenko and A.Y. Zomaya, "Local measures of information storage in complex distributed computation", Information Sciences, vol. 208, pp. 39-54, 2012.
    Author:
    Pedro AM Mediano (email, www), Joseph Lizier (email, www)
    See Also:
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate, ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo, MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel

      • PROP_MAX_CORR_AIS_NUM_SURROGATES

        public static final java.lang.String PROP_MAX_CORR_AIS_NUM_SURROGATES
        Property name for the number of surrogates to use in computing the bias correction if required for the ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.AUTO_EMBED_METHOD_MAX_CORR_AIS auto embedding method. Defaults to 20.

      • setProperty

        public void setProperty(java.lang.String propertyName,
               java.lang.String propertyValue)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets properties for the AIS multivariate kernel calculator. New property values are not guaranteed to take effect until the next call to an initialise method.

        Valid property names, and what their values should represent, include:

        • PROP_MAX_CORR_AIS_NUM_SURROGATES -- number of surrogates to use to compute the bias correction in the auto-embedding if the property ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.PROP_AUTO_EMBED_METHOD has been set to ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.AUTO_EMBED_METHOD_MAX_CORR_AIS. Defaults to 20
        • Any properties accepted by super#setProperty(String, String)
        • Or properties accepted by the underlying MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov.setProperty(String, String) implementation.
        Specified by:
        setProperty in interface ActiveInfoStorageCalculator
        Specified by:
        setProperty in interface InfoMeasureCalculatorContinuous
        Overrides:
        setProperty in class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of the property
        propertyValue - value of the property.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is a problem with the supplied value).
